papers.title: Developing low-cost 3D-printed prosthetics with a functional wrist for patients along the Thai-Myanmar border
papers.authors: Elkind, Emese; Tun, Aung Tin; Radcliffe, Olivia; Connolly, Laura; Davison, Colleen; Purkey, Eva; Mousavi, Parvin; Fichtinger, Gabor; Thornton, Kanchana
papers.conference: INOVAIT Image-Guided Therapy (IGT) x Imaging Network Ontario (ImNO), 2025
papers.abstract: Inadequacies in the Burmese healthcare system, heightened by the 2021 military coup and related civil war in Myanmar and the COVID-19 pandemic, have contributed to an influx of refugees to Thailand to seek medical aid. This study presents a design for an interchangeable and functional prosthetic wrist that enables critical hand motions such as rotation.

papers.title: A Modular and Extended Positioning Robotic System for Percutaneous Puncture Surgery
papers.authors: Li Haiyuan*, Cui Linlin, Zhang Yuhang, Zhang Qinjian and Wang Haoyu Wang
papers.conference: 2022 IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Biomimetics (ROBIO), Jinghong, China, 2022, pp. 1953-1957
papers.abstract: This paper presents a modular and extended positioning robotic system designed for percutaneous puncture surgery, aiming to improve the precision and efficiency of medical procedures.

papers.title: Path Planning and Control for Modular Self-assembling Robots on Rough Terrain
papers.authors: Li Haiyuan*, Wang Haoyu, Zhang Bin and Zhang Qinjian Zhang
papers.conference: 2022 IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Biomimetics (ROBIO), Jinghong, China, 2022, pp. 1953-1957
papers.abstract: This study focuses on developing effective path planning and control strategies for modular self-assembling robots operating on rough and uneven terrain.
